text: Herbert Salcher (3 November 1929 â€“ 9 November 2021) was an Austrian politician. He was a member of the Social Democratic Party of Austria. He was Minister of Social Affairs from 1970 to 1976, Federal Minister for Health and Environmental Protection from 1979 to 1981, and Minister of Finance from 1981 until 1984. He also was in the National Council in 1983. Salcher was born in Innsbruck, Austria. Salcher died on 9 November 2021 in Vienna, Austria at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Austrian politicians
title: Herbert Salcher
